newsitem.title: USA: IPO FILING - Friede Goldman International Inc.
newsitem.headline: IPO FILING - Friede Goldman International Inc.

text.p: Company Name Friede Goldman International Inc
Total shares to be offered 2.3 million
Shrs offered by shareholders 1.5 million Shrs outstanding after ipo 11,500,000

Underwriters over-allotment 570,000 shrs Business: Jackson, Miss., based company is a provider of conversion, retrofit and repair services for offshore drilling rigs, including jackups, submersibles, semisubmersibles and drillships.

Use of Proceeds: To fund portion of the company's anticipated capital requirements over the next 12 to 18 months, working capital and other general corporate purposes. Financial Data in 000s year ended Dec 31:
